```{r}
library(polmineR)
library(duplicates)
```


## Prune vocabulary

```{r}
use(pkg = "duplicates")

charcount <- corpus("REUTERS2") %>%
  charcount(
    p_attribute = "word",
    char_regex = "[a-zA-Z]",
    lowercase = TRUE,
    decreasing = FALSE
   )

vocab <- corpus("REUTERS2") %>% 
  p_attributes(p_attribute = "word") %>% 
  charfilter(chars = names(charcount[1:12]))

x <- corpus("REUTERS2") |>
  split(s_attribute = "doc_id")

dupl <- detect_duplicates(
    x = x,
    p_attribute = "word",
    s_attribute = "doc_id",
    mc = parallel::detectCores() - 2L,
    vocab = vocab
  )
```


## Run duplicate detection


```{r}
x <- corpus("REUTERS2") |>
  split(s_attribute = "doc_id")

dupl <- detect_duplicates(
    x = x,
    p_attribute = "word",
    s_attribute = "doc_id",
    mc = parallel::detectCores() - 2L,
    vocab = vocab
  )
```
